newsArray.title: Ben Stokes says no blame game after ‘anxious’ Rehan Ahmed visa wait
creator: AFP
newsArray.description: England skipper Ben Stokes said Wednesday that teenage spinner Rehan Ahmed had taken his visa scare in stride ahead of his scheduled appearance in this week’s third Test against India. The tourists made one change for the match starting in Rajkot on Thursday, with Mark Wood coming in as the second seamer alongside James Anderson.
